name: 5 for the King
description:
Download below!

NEW CONTENT WILL BE ADDED IN THE FUTURE! Feel free to leave a comment!

Can your king survive 5 minutes under attack by the forces of evil?

Find out for yourself and set your personal highscore!

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Control your knight and the 4 villagers

You can set your own controls or gamepad in the options!

Credits:

Villagers, King and Monsters by LYASeeK

Decor and Castle Tiles by Game Endeavor and Mega Tiles

Scrolls by pixel-boy

Coins by finalbossblues

Music by Aries Beats, ending theme by maxmakessounds
